description.english: Complete the first main mission objective.
description.german: Erstes Haupteinsatzziel absolvieren.
description.french: Atteindre le premier objectif de mission.
description.italian: Completa l'obiettivo della prima missione principale.
description.spanish: Completa el primer objetivo de misión principal.
description.russian: Выполните первое задание основной миссии.
description.portuguese: Conclua o primeiro objetivo da missão principal.

description.english: Kill two enemy vehicles with one rocket.
description.german: Zwei Feinde mit einer Rakete ausschalten.
description.french: Détruire 2 véhicules ennemis d'une roquette.
description.italian: Distruggi due veicoli nemici con un razzo.
description.spanish: Destruye dos vehículos enemigos con un misil.
description.russian: Уничтожьте два вражеских автомобиля одной ракетой.
description.portuguese: Destrua dois inimigos com um foguete.

description.english: Score at least 500,000 points in a single mission.
description.german: Mindestens 500.000 Punkte in einer Einzelmission erreichen.
description.french: Marquer au moins 500 000 points en une mission.
description.italian: Ottieni almeno 500.000 punti in una singola missione.
description.spanish: Consigue al menos 500.000 puntos en una misión.
description.russian: Наберите 500 000 или более очков в течение одной миссии
description.portuguese: Pontue pelo menos 500.000 em uma missão.

description.english: Purge the island of the dead.
description.german: Säubere die Insel der Toten.
description.french: Purger l'île des morts.
description.italian: Ripulisci l'Isola della morte.
description.spanish: Purga la isla de la muerte.
description.russian: Уничтожьте всех мертвецов на острове.
description.portuguese: Limpe a ilha dos zumbis.

description.english: Find and eliminate Pedro in all locations.
description.german: Pedro an allen Orten finden und ausschalten.
description.french: Trouver et éliminer Pedro dans chaque lieu.
description.italian: Trova Pedro ed eliminalo in tutti i luoghi.
description.spanish: Encuentra y mata a Pedro en todas las ubicaciones.
description.russian: Разыщите и убейте Педро в каждом из регионов.
description.portuguese: Encontre e destrua o Pedro em todos os locais.

description.english: Kill 100 enemy helicopters.
description.german: 100 Feindhelikopter abschießen.
description.french: Abattre 100 hélicos ennemis.
description.italian: Distruggi 100 elicotteri nemici.
description.spanish: Destruye 100 helicópteros enemigos.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 100 вражеских вертолетов
description.portuguese: Destrua 100 helicópteros inimigos.

description.english: Destroy 1,000 buildings.
description.german: 1.000 Gebäude zerstören.
description.french: Détruire 1 000 bâtiments.
description.italian: Distruggi 1.000 edifici.
description.spanish: Destruye 1.000 edificios.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 1000 зданий
description.portuguese: Destrua 1.000 prédios.

description.english: Complete a mission in co-op mode.
description.german: Eine Mission im Koop-Modus beenden.
description.french: Terminer une mission en mode Coop.
description.italian: Completa una missione in modalità Coop.
description.spanish: Completa una misión en modo cooperativo.
description.russian: Выполните миссиию в режиме совместной игры
description.portuguese: Conclua uma missão no modo cooperativo.

description.english: Complete the 'Stomp The Snake' mission on expert difficulty level in co-op mode.
description.german: Die Mission „Die Schlange häuten“ im Schwierigkeitsgrad „Profi“ erfüllen.
description.french: Terminer « Écraser la vipère » en mode Coop et difficulté Expert.
description.italian: Completa la missione "Schiaccia il Serpente" a difficoltà Esperto in modalità Coop.
description.spanish: Completa la misión "Pisa la Serpiente" en dificultad experto en modo cooperativo.
description.russian: Выполните миссию "Змеиное жало" на уровне сложности "Эксперт".
description.portuguese: Conclua a missão "Paulada na cobra" no Veterano em modo cooperativo.

description.english: Complete a (non-tutorial) mission using only rockets.
description.german: Eine Mission (kein Tutorial) nur mit Raketen erfüllen.
description.french: Finir 1 mission (hors didacticiel) à la roquette exclusivement.
description.italian: Completa una missione (non tutorial) usando solo i razzi.
description.spanish: Completa una misión (el tutorial no) usando solo misiles.
description.russian: Выполните любую миссию, кроме самой первой, используя только ракеты.
description.portuguese: Conclua uma missão (não pode ser do tutorial) usando somente foguetes.

description.english: Complete a (non-tutorial) mission using only the machine gun.
description.german: Eine Mission (kein Tutorial) nur mit dem MG erfüllen.
description.french: Finir 1 mission (hors didacticiel) à la mitrailleuse exclusivement.
description.italian: Completa una missione (non tutorial) usando solo la mitragliatrice.
description.spanish: Completa una misión (el tutorial no) usando solo la ametralladora.
description.russian: Выполните любую миссию, кроме самой первой, используя только пулемет.
description.portuguese: Conclua uma missão (não pode ser do tutorial) usando somente a metralhadora.

description.english: Destroy your chopper with your own guided rocket.
description.german: Den eigenen Hubschrauber mit der Lenkrakete zerstören.
description.french: Détruire votre hélico avec votre propre roquette guidée.
description.italian: Distruggi il tuo elicottero usando un tuo razzo teleguidato.
description.spanish: Destruye tu helicóptero con tu propio misil guiado.
description.russian: Уничтожьте ваш вертолет вашей же управляемой ракетой.
description.portuguese: Destrua seu helicóptero com seu próprio míssil teleguiado.

description.english: Collect all 25 crates hidden in various locations.
description.german: Alle 25 Kisten an verschiedenen Orten einsammeln.
description.french: Récupérer les 25 caisses cachées dans le jeu.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le 25 casse nascoste in vari luoghi.
description.spanish: Recoge 25 cajas escondidas en distintos sitios.
description.russian: Соберите 25 ящиков, спрятанных в разных местах
description.portuguese: Colete todos os 25 caixotes escondidos nos vários locais.

description.english: Complete a (non-tutorial) mission in 8 minutes or less.
description.german: Eine Mission (kein Tutorial) in maximal 8 Minuten erfüllen.
description.french: Accomplir une mission (hors didacticiel) en 8 min maximum.
description.italian: Completa una missione (non tutorial) in 8 minuti o meno.
description.spanish: Completa una misión (el tutorial no) en 8 minutos o menos.
description.russian: Выполните любую миссию, кроме самой первой, за 8 минут или еще быстрее.
description.portuguese: Conclua uma missão (sem ser do tutorial) em 8 minutos ou menos.

description.english: Kill 10 vehicles by smashing into them.
description.german: 10 Fahrzeuge durch Rammen ausschalten.
description.french: Détruire 10 véhicules en les percutant.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 veicoli schiantandoti contro di essi.
description.spanish: Destruye 10 vehículos chocando contra ellos.
description.russian: Уничтожьте 10 автомобилей, протаранив их.
description.portuguese: Destrua 10 veículos batendo forte neles.

displayName.spanish: Así se Mata a un Jefe

description.english: Kill a boss/miniboss by smashing into it.
description.german: Einen Boss/Miniboss durch Rammen ausschalten.
description.french: Tuer un boss/miniboss en le percutant.
description.italian: Uccidi un boss/miniboss schiantandoti contro di esso.
description.spanish: Mata a un jefe o minijefe chocando contra él.
description.russian: Убейте босса или минибосса, протаранив его.
description.portuguese: Destrua um chefão/minichefão encostando forte nele.

description.english: Locate and winch up the Lost Ark.
description.german: Verlorenen Schatz finden und hochziehen.
description.french: Trouver et remonter l'arche perdue.
description.italian: Trova l'Arca perduta e raccoglila con l'argano.
description.spanish: Encuentra y recoge el Arca Perdida.
description.russian: Найдите и поднимите на борт Потерянный Ковчег
description.portuguese: Localize e pegue a Arca perdida.

description.english: Complete at least one mission with each helicopter.
description.german: Mindestens eine Mission mit jedem Helikopter abschließen.
description.french: Accomplir au moins une mission avec chacun des hélicoptères.
description.italian: Completa almeno una missione con tutti gli elicotteri.
description.spanish: Completa al menos una misión con cada helicóptero.
description.russian: Выполните хотя бы одну миссию на вертолете каждого из типов.
description.portuguese: Conclua ao menos uma missão com cada helicóptero.

description.english: Complete all levels at least on normal difficulty.
description.german: Alle Levels auf "Normal" oder höher abschließen.
description.french: Terminer tous les niveaux en difficulté Normale minimum.
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli almeno a difficoltà Normale.
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles en dificultad normal o superior.
description.russian: Выполните каждую из миссий на уровне сложности "Пилот" или более высоком.
description.portuguese: Conclua todos os níveis na dificuldade normal.

description.english: Get all stars in all missions.
description.german: In allen Mission alle Sterne erhalten.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les étoiles du jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le stelle in tutte le missioni.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las estrellas en todas las misiones.
description.russian: Получите все звезды на каждой из миссий.
description.portuguese: Consiga todas as estrelas em todas as missões.
